model.interfaces
Interface ITransition<NodeType>

Type Parameters:
NodeType - the type of the nodes which are connected by this transition
All Known Subinterfaces:
IMultiSourceTransition<NodeType>
All Known Implementing Classes:
EventTransition, MultiSourceTransition, Partition, Relation, Transition
public interface ITransition<NodeType>

A generic interface for a transition. This interface provides method to modify the transition.

Author:
sigurd
